name: Jansport Agave Daypack - Women's
description: A substantial pack to accommodate today's complexities. Use for weekend hiking as well as urban service. A padded sleeve holds a laptop or 3L water reservoir. The main compartment fits a full course-load of texts plus a jacket and sandwiches. And the side pockets give you places to stash a water bottle, a travel mugs or a wet umbrella.Contoured AirCore shoulder straps. Women's design is set a bit closer together, are a bit narrower and made of ventilated foam with mesh overlayWebbing waistbelt.Zippered clamshell opening to access main and secondary compartments.Tricot lined internal padded sleeve fits a 15in. laptop.Zippered top pocket is perfect for your phone.Front zippered pocket.Mesh side pockets for water bottles or umbrella.Front daisy chain and lash loops on front and a strap for attaching a light.
